displayName.spanish: La última esperanza de la humanidad

description.english: Venture out to an outpost and cleanse its corrupted crystal shard from the blight
description.german: Einen Außenposten aufsuchen und die verseuchte Kristallscherbe säubern.
description.french: Progressez jusqu’à un avant-poste et purifiez son éclat de cristal de la corruption qui l’attaque
description.italian: Vai a un avamposto e ripulisci il cristallo dalla corruzione
description.spanish: Llega hasta un asentamiento y purifica el fragmento de cristal corrupto de la plaga
description.schinese: 冒险前往一座哨塔，净化其被腐蚀腐化的水晶碎片
description.russian: Посетить форпост и очистить осколок кристалла от порчи.
description.japanese: 砦を出て腐敗したクリスタルの欠片を浄化する
description.polish: Odwiedź dowolny bastion i oczyść jego spaczony kryształ z zarazy

description.english: Recruit a follower
description.french: Recrutez un partisan
description.italian: Recluta un compagno
description.spanish: Recluta a un seguidor
description.japanese: 仲間を勧誘する

description.english: Have your followers construct a hut in your refuge
description.german: Lass deine Gefährten im Versteck eine Hütte bauen.
description.french: Faites construire une hutte dans votre refuge par vos partisans
description.italian: Fai costruire ai tuoi compagni una capanna nel rifugio
description.spanish: Haz que tus seguidores construyan una cabaña en tu refugio
description.schinese: 让你的追随者在你的避难所里建造一个小屋
description.russian: Силами соратников построить хижину в убежище.
description.japanese: 仲間に居住地に小屋を建てさせる
description.polish: Poleć sprzymierzeńcom, by zbudowali w azylu chatkę

description.english: Store an object inside your refuge’s stash
description.german: Bewahre ein Objekt in deinem Versteckvorrat auf.
description.french: Stockez un objet dans la réserve de votre refuge
description.italian: Conserva un oggetto nelle scorte del rifugio
description.spanish: Guarda un objeto dentro de las reservas del refugio
description.schinese: 在你的储备里存放一个物品
description.japanese: 居住地の備蓄にアイテムを加える
description.polish: Schowaj przedmiot w swojej skrytce w azylu

description.english: Have your followers construct palisades and a gate to protect your refuge
description.german: Lass deine Gefährten zum Schutz des Verstecks Palisaden und ein Tor bauen.
description.french: Faites construire des palissades et une porte pour protéger votre refuge par vos partisans
description.italian: Fai costruire ai tuoi compagni delle palizzate e un cancello per proteggere il rifugio
description.spanish: Haz que tus seguidores construyan empalizadas y una puerta para proteger tu refugio
description.schinese: 让你的追随者修建栏杆和一个门来保护你的避难所
description.russian: Силами соратников возвести частокол и ворота для защиты убежища.
description.japanese: 仲間に居住地を守る防塀と門を建てさせる
description.polish: Poleć sprzymierzeńcom, by zbudowali chroniące azyl palisady i bramę

displayName.italian: Ogni tuo desiderio è un ordine
displayName.schinese: 我的愿望就是你的命令

description.english: Manually assign a task to a follower
description.german: Weise einem Gefährten manuell eine Aufgabe zu.
description.french: Assignez manuellement une tâche à un partisan
description.italian: Assegna manualmente un lavoro a un compagno
description.spanish: Asigna manualmente una tarea a un seguidor
description.schinese: 手动分配任务给追随者
description.japanese: 仲間に直接作業を割り当てる

displayName.german: Zu Hause ist es am schönsten

description.english: Rest in your refuge’s very own shelter
description.german: Im eigenen Unterschlupf deines Verstecks ausruhen
description.french: Reposez-vous dans l’abri de votre refuge
description.italian: Riposa nel riparo del tuo rifugio
description.spanish: Descansa en la guarida de tu propio refugio
description.schinese: 在自己的避难所里休息
description.russian: Отдохнуть в укрытии в вашем убежище.
description.japanese: 避難所の自分のシェルターで休息を取る
description.polish: Odpocznij w schronieniu na terenie swojego azylu

description.english: Cut down a tree and harvest it for wood
description.german: Fälle einen Baum, um Holz daraus zu gewinnen.
description.french: Abattez un arbre et récupérez son bois
description.italian: Taglia un albero e ricavane della legna
description.spanish: Tala un árbol y consigue madera
description.schinese: 砍倒一棵树，并收获木材
description.russian: Повалить дерево и собрать с него древесину.
description.japanese: 木を1本切り倒して木材を採集する
description.polish: Zetnij drzewo i pozyskaj z niego drewno

description.english: Hunt a deer and harvest it for meat
description.german: Jage ein Rentier, um Fleisch daraus zu gewinnen.
description.french: Chassez un renne et récupérez sa viande
description.italian: Caccia una renna e ricavane la carne
description.spanish: Caza un reno y consigue carne
description.schinese: 猎获一匹鹿，并收获鹿肉
description.russian: Убить оленя и срезать с него мясо.
description.japanese: トナカイを狩り肉を採集する
description.polish: Upoluj renifera i pozyskaj z niego mięso

displayName.japanese: パーフェクトブロック

description.english: Block an enemy’s attack at the very last moment
description.german: Blocke den Angriff eines Gegners in letzter Sekunde ab.
description.french: Bloquez l'attaque d'un ennemi au dernier moment
description.italian: Para un attacco nemico all'ultimo istante
description.spanish: Bloquea un ataque enemigo en el último momento
description.schinese: 在最后一刻抵挡敌人的进攻
description.russian: Заблокировать удар врага в последний момент.
description.japanese: 敵の攻撃をヒット直前にブロックする
description.polish: W ostatniej chwili zablokuj atak przeciwnika

description.english: Rescue two wolves, construct a kennel and take your new sled for a spin
description.german: Rette zwei Wölfe, baue einen Zwinger und unternimm eine Schlittentour.
description.french: Sauvez deux loups, construisez une niche et faites un tour avec votre nouveau traîneau
description.italian: Salva due lupi, costruisci un canile e fai un giro con la tua nuova slitta
description.spanish: Rescata dos lobos, construye una caseta y date una vuelta en tu nuevo trineo
description.schinese: 营救两匹狼，建造一个狗舍，并带上你的新雪橇去兜风
description.russian: Спасти двух волков, построить конуру и прокатиться на новеньких нартах.
description.japanese: 狼を2匹救出し、犬ぞり小屋を建ててソリを走らせる
description.polish: Uratuj dwa wilki, zbuduj psiarnię i przejedź się nowymi saniami

description.english: Collect three shards of the same type
description.french: Obtenez trois éclats du même type
description.italian: Raccogli tre frammenti dello stesso tipo
description.spanish: Consigue tres fragmentos del mismo tipo
description.schinese: 收集相同类型的三块碎片
description.japanese: 1種類の欠片を3つ集める
description.polish: Zbierz trzy odłamki tego samego typu

description.english: Collect three shards of each type
description.german: Sammle drei Exemplare eines jeden Scherbentyps.
description.french: Obtenez trois éclats de chaque type
description.italian: Raccogli tre frammenti di ogni tipo
description.spanish: Consigue tres fragmentos de distinto tipo
description.schinese: 收集不同类型的三块碎片
description.russian: Собрать по три осколка всех типов.
description.japanese: 各種の欠片を3つずつ集める
description.polish: Zbierz po trzy odłamki każdego typu

description.english: Collect all shards
description.french: Obtenez tous les éclats
description.italian: Raccogli tutti i frammenti
description.spanish: Consigue todos los fragmentos
description.japanese: すべての欠片を集める

description.english: Collect all toys for Alice
description.french: Obtenez tous les jouets pour Alice
description.italian: Recupera tutti i giocattoli per Alice
description.spanish: Consigue todos los juguetes para Alice
description.schinese: 为爱丽丝收集所有玩具
description.japanese: アリスのおもちゃをすべて集める

description.english: Cleanse the outposts in the Flats, Peaks, Prairie and Pit
description.german: Säubere die Außenposten im Flachland, in den Gipfeln, in der Prärie und in der Grube.
description.french: Purifiez les avant-postes dans les plaines, les sommets, la prairie et la fosse
description.italian: Ripulisci gli avamposti nella pianura, nelle vette, nella prateria e nella fossa
description.spanish: Purifica los asentamientos de Las Planicies, Las Cumbres, La Pradera y El Foso
description.schinese: 净化平原、山峰、大草原和坑洞的哨站
description.russian: Очистить форпосты на Равнинах, Вершинах, в Степи и Яме.
description.japanese: 平地・山岳地帯・大草原・大穴の砦を浄化する
description.polish: Oczyść wszystkie bastiony na równinach, w górach, na prerii i w czeluści

description.english: Cleanse the Wreck
description.french: Purifiez l'épave
description.italian: Ripulisci il relitto
description.spanish: Purifica los restos del accidente
description.japanese: 難破船を浄化する

description.english: Cleanse the Glare outpost to access the shuttle
description.french: Purifiez la navette
description.italian: Ripulisci lo shuttle
description.spanish: Purifica la lanzadera
description.japanese: シャトルを浄化する

description.english: Break the cycle of torment
description.french: Brisez le cycle de tourment
description.italian: Spezza il ciclo del tormento
description.spanish: Rompe el ciclo de tormento
description.japanese: 苦しみのサイクルを断つ

description.english: Discover both endings
description.french: Découvrez les deux fins
description.italian: Scopri entrambi i finali
description.spanish: Descubre ambos finales
description.japanese: 両方のエンディングを見る

description.english: Recall all suppressed memories in your dreams
description.german: Lass in deinen Träumen alle verdrängten Erinnerungen zurückkommen.
description.french: Rappelez-vous tous les souvenirs supprimés dans vos rêves
description.italian: Recupera in sogno tutti i ricordi soppressi
description.spanish: Recupera todos los recuerdos reprimidos en tus sueños
description.schinese: 唤醒所有梦中压抑的记忆
description.japanese: 抑圧されたすべての記憶を夢で見る
description.polish: Przywołaj w snach wszystkie wyparte wspomnienia

description.english: Recruit Rhys
description.french: Recrutez Rhys
description.italian: Recluta Rhys
description.spanish: Recluta a Rhys
description.japanese: リースを仲間にした

description.english: Recruit Vic
description.french: Recrutez Vic
description.italian: Recluta Vic
description.spanish: Recluta a Vic
description.japanese: ヴィクを仲間にした

description.english: Recruit Jin
description.french: Recrutez Jin
description.italian: Recluta Jin
description.spanish: Recluta a Jin
description.japanese: ジンを仲間にした

description.english: Recruit Gani
description.french: Recrutez Gani
description.italian: Recluta Gani
description.spanish: Recluta a Gani
description.japanese: ガーニを仲間にした

description.english: Recruit Tua
description.french: Recrutez Tua
description.italian: Recluta Tua
description.spanish: Recluta a Tua
description.japanese: トゥアを仲間にした

description.english: Recruit Ryme
description.french: Recrutez Ryme
description.italian: Recluta Ryme
description.spanish: Recluta a Ryme
description.japanese: ライムを仲間にした

description.english: Recruit Issa
description.french: Recrutez Issa
description.italian: Recluta Issa
description.spanish: Recluta a Issa
description.japanese: イッサを仲間にした

description.english: Recruit Ezra
description.french: Recrutez Ezra
description.italian: Recluta Ezra
description.spanish: Recluta a Ezra
description.japanese: エズラを仲間にした

description.english: Recruit all potential followers throughout your lifetimes
description.german: Rekrutiere im Lauf deiner Leben alle potenziellen Gefährten.
description.french: Recrutez tous vos partisans potentiels au cours de vos vies
description.italian: Recluta ogni potenziale compagno nel corso di tutte le tue vite
description.spanish: Recluta a todos los posibles seguidores durante tus vidas
description.schinese: 招募你一生中所有的潜在追随者
description.russian: Взять с собой всех возможных соратников на протяжении всех жизней.
description.japanese: 過去のライフを含めすべての生存者を仲間にする

description.english: Get four wolves to pull your sled
description.german: Hol dir vier Wölfe als Zugtiere für deinen Schlitten.
description.french: Trouvez quatre loups pour tirer votre traîneau
description.italian: Fai trainare la tua slitta da quattro lupi
description.spanish: Consigue cuatro lobos para tirar del trineo
description.japanese: ソリを4匹の狼に引かせた
description.polish: Spraw, by cztery wilki ciągnęły sanie

description.english: Get six wolves to pull your sled
description.german: Hol dir sechs Wölfe als Zugtiere für deinen Schlitten.
description.french: Trouvez six loups pour tirer votre traîneau
description.italian: Fai trainare la tua slitta da sei lupi
description.spanish: Consigue seis lobos para tirar del trineo
description.japanese: ソリを6匹の狼に引かせた
description.polish: Spraw, by sześć wilków ciągnęło sanie

displayName.italian: Uno che si è fatto da sé

description.english: Craft an item with your own two hands
description.french: Fabriquez un objet de vos propres mains
description.italian: Crea un oggetto con le tue mani
description.spanish: Fabrica un objeto con tus propias manos
description.schinese: 用自己的双手制作一个物品
description.japanese: 自らの手でアイテムを作成する

description.english: Have an adept follower craft better items for you
description.german: Lass einen fortgeschrittenen Gefährten bessere Gegenstände für dich herstellen.
description.french: Faites en sorte qu'un partisan adepte vous fabrique de meilleurs objets
description.italian: Ordina a un compagno abile di creare oggetti migliori
description.spanish: Haz que un seguidor avanzado fabrique objetos mejores para ti
description.schinese: 让一个熟练的追随者为你制作更好的物品
description.russian: Попросите соратника-знатока создать для вас предметы высокого качества.
description.japanese: スキルの熟練者に上級アイテムを作成させる
description.polish: Spraw, by sprzymierzeniec-adept tworzył dla ciebie lepsze przedmioty

description.english: Have an expert follower craft the best items possible for you
description.german: Lass dir von einem Expertengefährten die bestmöglichen Gegenstände herstellen.
description.french: Faites en sorte qu'un partisan expert vous fabrique les meilleurs objets possibles
description.italian: Ordina a un compagno competente di creare i migliori oggetti possibili
description.spanish: Haz que un seguidor experto fabrique los mejores objetos posibles para ti
description.schinese: 让一个专业的追随者为你制作最好的物品
description.russian: Попросите соратника-эксперта создать для вас предметы высочайшего качества.
description.japanese: スキルの達人に最上級アイテムを作成させる
description.polish: Spraw, by sprzymierzeniec-ekspert tworzył dla ciebie najlepsze przedmioty

description.english: Gain the trust of a follower and have them confide in you
description.german: Gewinne das Vertrauen eines Gefährten, sodass er sich dir offenbart.
description.french: Gagnez la confiance d'un de vos partisans pour qu'il se confie à vous
description.italian: Conquista la fiducia di un compagno e ascolta una sua confidenza
description.spanish: Gánate la confianza de un seguidor y consigue que te cuente un secreto
description.schinese: 获得一个追随者的信任，让他相信你
description.russian: Заслужить доверие соратника и выслушать его историю.
description.japanese: 仲間に信頼され過去の話を聞く
description.polish: Zdobądź zaufanie sprzymierzeńca i spraw, by ci się zwierzył

description.english: Gain the full trust of one of your followers
description.german: Gewinne das volle Vertrauen eines deiner Gefährten.
description.french: Gagnez la confiance totale de l'un de vos partisans
description.italian: Conquista la fiducia totale di un tuo compagno
description.spanish: Gánate la confianza absoluta de uno de tus seguidores
description.schinese: 获得你的一个追随者的完全信任
description.russian: Заслужить полное доверие одного из соратников.
description.japanese: 仲間1人から完全に信頼される
description.polish: Zdobądź pełne zaufanie jednego ze sprzymierzeńców

description.english: Gain the full trust of all potential followers throughout your lifetimes
description.german: Gewinne im Lauf deiner Leben das volle Vertrauen aller potenziellen Gefährten.
description.french: Gagnez la confiance totale de tous vos partisans potentiels au cours de vos vies
description.italian: Conquista la fiducia totale di ogni potenziale compagno nel corso di tutte le tue vite
description.spanish: Gánate la confianza absoluta de todos los posibles seguidores durante tus vidas
description.schinese: 获得你一生中所有潜在追随者的完全信任
description.russian: Заслужить полное доверие всех возможных соратников на протяжении всех жизней.
description.japanese: 過去のライフを含めすべての生存者に完全に信頼される
description.polish: Zdobądź pełne zaufanie wszystkich potencjalnych sprzymierzeńców

description.english: Discover the Flats
description.french: Découvrez les plaines
description.italian: Scopri la pianura
description.spanish: Descubre Las Planicies
description.japanese: 平地を発見する

description.english: Discover the Peaks
description.french: Découvrez les sommets
description.italian: Scopri le vette
description.spanish: Descubre Las Cumbres
description.japanese: 山岳地帯を発見する

description.english: Discover the Prairie
description.french: Découvrez la prairie
description.italian: Scopri la prateria
description.spanish: Descubre La Pradera
description.japanese: 大草原を発見する

description.english: Discover the Wreck
description.french: Découvrez l'épave
description.italian: Scopri il relitto
description.spanish: Descubre los restos del accidente
description.japanese: 難破船を発見する

description.english: Discover the Pit
description.french: Découvrez la fosse
description.italian: Scopri la fossa
description.spanish: Descubre el foso
description.japanese: 大穴を発見する

description.english: Discover the Glare
description.french: Découvrez l'Aura
description.italian: Scopri il bagliore
description.spanish: Descubre Bruma
description.japanese: 輝きの地を発見する

description.english: Survive your first blizzard
description.french: Survivez à votre premier blizzard
description.italian: Sopravvivi alla prima tormenta
description.spanish: Sobrevive a tu primera ventisca
description.japanese: 吹雪を生き延びる
